dcterms:description: A multi-modal corpus designed for Emotion Recognition in Conversations (ERC) task in chit-chat or open-domain dialogues, comprising 151 dialogues with 10,039 utterances from 10 distinct speakers, annotated with nine emotion classes.
dcterms:title: IEMOCAP

dcterms:creator: Shutong Feng
Nurul Lubis
Christian Geishauser
Hsien-chin Lin
Michael Heck
Carel van Niekerk
Milica Gasic
dcterms:description: A text-based ERC corpus built for emotion recognition in task-oriented dialogues, comprising 10,438 human-human dialogues and 1,000 human-machine dialogues, with seven distinct user emotions designed to encode task performance.
dcterms:title: EmoWOZ

dcterms:creator: Jonathan Gratch
Ron Artstein
Gale Lucas
Giota Stratou
Stefan Scherer
Angela Nazarian
Rachel Wood
Jill Boberg
David DeVault
Stacy Marsella
David Traum
Skip Rizzo
Louis-Philippe Morency
dcterms:description: A speech-based corpus for depression detection and analysis, including clinical interviews with PHQ-8 scores to quantify the severity of depressive symptoms.
dcterms:title: DAIC-WOZ
